page.title: PTL Express, your logistics partner.
page.description: Pr√©sentation website of PTL Express's activities.

societe.pitch-p1: We are a young, rapidly developing transport and charter company. We specialize in small volume express transport throughout Europe. Our team is young, dynamic and qualified, ready to take up any challenge.
societe.pitch-p2:
Our strengths:
Availability - 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.
Responsiveness - Immediate quote for your transport.
Commitment - We strive to meet all your requests.
Quality - Our team monitors your transport and ensures that loading and delivery deadlines are met.
Multilingualism - French, English, German, Spanish, Italian.

service.express-p1:
For all your urgent shipments in France or internationally.

Any type of packaging up to 22 tons, price adjusted thanks to a complete fleet which allows to adapt to the nature of the goods.

Dedicated transport without breaking loads.
Ad valorem insurance for your sensitive shipments on request.

Request your immediate quote.
service.express-e1: Transit time variable depending on destination.
service.express-e2: Excluding alcohol and perishable food. All conditioning.
